name: Introduction to Gender and Sexuality Studies in Literature
description: This course provides students with an introduction to the field of gender and sexuality studies through a study of historical and contemporary literature.

name: Gender, Race, and Class in Literature
description: This course examines how gender, race, and class intersect and interact in literature.
prerequisites: Introduction to Gender and Sexuality Studies in Literature

name: Queer Theory and Representation
description: This course explores how queer identities are represented in literature and how this representation has changed over time.
prerequisites: Introduction to Gender and Sexuality Studies in Literature
Gender, Race, and Class in Literature

name: Gender and Sexuality in the Postmodern Age
description: This course examines how gender and sexuality have been represented in literature since the postmodern period.
prerequisites: Introduction to Gender and Sexuality Studies in Literature
Gender, Race, and Class in Literature
